email1.subject: Test Email 1 - Playwright Automation
email1.body: Hello! This is a test email sent via Playwright automation from j.francisco8281@gmail.com. Testing successful!

email2.subject: Test Email 2 - Automated Testing
email2.body: This is the second test email for our automation suite. This email contains important test data.

email3.subject: Test Email 3 - Final Test
email3.body: This is the third and final test email. Our automation testing is now complete.

invalidEmail.subject: Invalid Email Recipient Test
invalidEmail.body: This is the second test email for our automation suite. This email recipient is invalid.

noRecipientEmail.subject: Email without recipient
noRecipientEmail.body: This email is missing a recipient to test error handling.

noSubjectEmail.body: This email is missing a subject to test error handling.
